description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Capsicum, Sweet Potato, Caramelised Onion & Feta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grilled Capsicum, Sweet Potato, Caramelised Onion & Feta Salad
name: Grilled Capsicum, Sweet Potato, Caramelised Onion & Feta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange spinach and rocket mix, chargrilled vegetables and tomatoes on a serving platter. Add the feta and half of the caramelised onion (see tip). Season and serve.
